name: Keen Revel IV EXP Mid Polar Waterproof Winter Boot - Men's
categories: Revel IV EXP Mid Polar Waterproof Winter Boot
description:
Don’t let winter slow you down. These active winter boots are packed with insulation to keep your feet warm while hiking, snowshoeing, or shoveling the driveway in cold temperatures. The aggressively lugged sole has ice-gripping pods so you stay upright in slippery winter terrain.LWG-certified leather and mesh upper.Keen.Dry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry.200g Keen.Warm insulation is made from recycled P.E.T.Wicking liner with antimicrobial treatment resists odours.Insulated insole with reflective layer to radiate heat back towards your foot.Compression-moulded EVA midsole has a TPU chank for stability.Keen.Polar Traction rubber outsole grips snow and ice.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
